deposit.details: A $25 deposit is required to secure your appointment. Deposits are non-refundable but will be applied to your service total.

cancellation.policy_text: Please provide at least 24 hours notice for cancellations or rescheduling. Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice or no-shows will result in loss of deposit.

late_arrival.policy_text: We understand delays happen! Please call if you're running late. Arrivals more than 15 minutes late may need to be rescheduled and could result in loss of deposit.

after_appointment: Keep lashes dry for the first 24 hours
Avoid steam, saunas, and hot showers for 24 hours
Do not rub or pull on your lashes
daily_care: Brush lashes gently each morning with a clean spoolie
Clean lashes daily with lash extension-safe cleanser
Avoid oil-based products around the eye area
Sleep on your back when possible
maintenance: Never pick or pull at extensions
Come in for professional removal when needed

faq.How long do lash extensions last?: Lash extensions typically last 4-6 weeks with proper care, but we recommend getting fills every 2-3 weeks to maintain fullness as your natural lashes shed naturally.
faq.Does it hurt?: No! The application is completely painless. Most clients find it so relaxing they fall asleep during the service.
faq.How long does it take?: Full sets typically take 1.5-2.5 hours depending on the style. Fills usually take 45-90 minutes.
faq.Can I wear makeup?: Yes, but avoid oil-based makeup and makeup removers. We recommend using lash extension-safe products.
faq.How do I prepare?: Come with clean lashes (no makeup), and avoid caffeine before your appointment as it can make your eyes flutter.
faq.Classic vs Hybrid vs Volume?: Classic gives a natural mascara look, Volume creates dramatic fullness, and Hybrid is a mix of both for a fuller but natural appearance.
faq.Do I need a patch test?: We recommend a patch test if you have sensitive eyes or have never had lash extensions before.
faq.Can I swim?: Yes, after the initial 24-hour curing period. Just be gentle and pat dry instead of rubbing.
faq.What if I'm not happy?: Your satisfaction is our priority! Please let us know immediately and we'll work to make it right.
faq.Free consultation?: Yes! We offer free consultations to discuss your desired look and answer any questions.
